* Temporary internal concrete subclass of MeasureFormat implementing parsing and formatting of * CurrencyAmount objects. This class is likely to be redesigned and rewritten in the near future. * *

* This class currently delegates to DecimalFormat for parsing and formatting. * * @see android.icu.text.UFormat * @see android.icu.text.DecimalFormat * @author Alan Liu

methods.name: public StringBuffer format(Object obj, StringBuffer toAppendTo, FieldPosition pos)
public CurrencyAmount parseObject(String source, ParsePosition pos)
